attributes.action: Not to sign up to ACTA in its current form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The US is trying to force ACTA (Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement) a multi-lateral intellectual property trade agreement. It contains a clause designed to criminalize the non-profit facilitation of unauthorized information exchange on the internet. This would turn the majority of internet users in this country into defacto criminals, and pave the way for more abusive practises by copyright holders and those wishing to crush dissent.
The internet should be about freedom of information and expression.
